description:
Original post: https://www.gcppodcast.com/post/episode-126-beam-and-spark-with-holden-karau/

Holden Karau is on the podcast this week to talk all about Spark and Beam, two open source tools that helps process data at scale, with Mark and Melanie.
title: Beam and Spark with Holden Karau: GCPPodcast 126
